name: Egghead to the Rescue
overview: The objective on each level is to run round the screens collecting all the keys in sight. The castle is patrolled by many of your enemies. Don't touch any of them or you will lose a life. Lives are also lost if Egghead falls too far. When all the keys are collected, find the prison cell and release your chum.
developers: Chris Dewhurst, Jonathan Cauldwell & Kees Van Oss
